abilities.name: Lethal
Feats
abilities.action: Alertness, Dodge, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Mobility

abilities.name: Combat
abilities.action: Like zombies, mohrgs attack by slamming enemies with their fists. They often catch opponents flat-footed, for they move much faster than zombies.

abilities.name: Full Attacks
abilities.action:
① ``Slam``[[@{matk}]]⥤``tongue``
② ``2 slams``[[@{matk}]]⥤``2 wings``[[@{matk}-2]]⥤``bite``[[@{matk}-2]]
(if multiattack)
③ ``+2 vorpal sword``[[@{matk}]]/[[@{matk}-5]]/[[@{matk}-10]]/[[@{matk}-15]]

abilities.name: Attacks
abilities.action:
[[@{matk}]]   /   [[@{ratk}]]

[[@{strd}]] / [[@{dexd}]] / [[@{cond}]] / [[@{intd}]] / [[@{wisd}]] / [[@{chad}]]

``Slam``+[[@{matk}]] melee (**1d6**+[[@{strd}]] bldg)
``Sting``+[[@{matk}]] melee (**1d8**+[[@{strd}]] pierc)
``Tongue``+[[@{matk}]] m-touch (**paralysis**)
``Acid Spit``+[[@{ratk}]] r-touch (**1d4** acid)
``+1 vorpal longsword``+[[@{matk}+1]] (**2d6**+[[@{strd}+1]]/19)

abilities.name: Qualities
abilities.action: ``Improved Grab (Ex)`` - To use this ability, a mohrg must hit a creature of its size or smaller with its slam attack. It can then attempt to start a grapple as a **free action** without provoking an attack of opportunity.
